lead_paragraph: Colleen De Reuck, who has run in four Olympic marathons, and Alan Culpepper, who has run in two, joined the field yesterday for the first NYC Half-Marathon on Aug. 27.
snippet: Colleen De Reuck, who has run in four Olympic marathons, and Alan Culpepper, who has run in two, joined the field yesterday for the first NYC Half-Marathon on Aug. 27.
